BodyName: Committee on Women and Gender Equity
Location: HYBRID HEARING - Committee Room - City Hall

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to the establishment of a Marshall plan for moms task force to develop and issue recommendations on how to support working mothers, other parents, and caregivers
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishment of a Marshall plan for moms task force to develop and issue recommendations on how to support working mothers, other parents, and caregivers.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S. 7595/ A. 8623, S. 6706B/ A. 7582A, and S. 7615/ A. 8625, legislation supporting the provision of financial assistance to families and child care providers in order to make child care more accessible and affordable.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Supporting the provision of financial assistance to families and child care providers in order to make child care more accessible and affordable. (S. 7595,  A. 8623, S. 6706B,  A. 7582A, S. 7615 and A. 8625)
